Executive Cleaning Solutions is the right choice for you
What drives us to be the best in this very competitive industry? Executive Cleaning Solutions is driven by our commitment to customer service. We have found over the years that our customer service and client satisfaction results in long term relationships. You will not have to worry about juggling cleaning companies once you have Executive Cleaning Solutions inside your facility. This always you to focus on your job, while we focus on keeping your work environment clean.
Executive Cleaning Solutions can help you reduce your workload. Not only can we ensure a clean facility, but we can handle your supply ordering (soap, toilet paper, etc.), floor maintenance, windowing cleaning, along with other services. By using us as a “one stop shop”, you will not have to be concerned about all these stressors.
Our statistics show, on an average we maintain our clients for over five years. We are proud of this measurable, as it shows that our rates are competitive, the service is exceptional and our clients appreciate the staff we employ. By contacting Executive Cleaning Solutions today, we will begin working towards a cleaning plan that is conducive to your needs.
What we provide
An effective plan to ensure your facility is clean based on your requirements
Superior service from our highly trained and friendly staff
We use “green” supplies and environment friendly equipment
Flexibility and commitment
